<title level="1" right="Rules">[Round](/Rules.aspx?ID=3308)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A round is a period of time during an [encounter](/Rules.aspx?ID=2421) in which all participants get a chance to act. A round represents approximately 6 seconds in game time.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
